bio.experienceSummary: As a paid childcare provider my career began at age 13 caring for small children in the neighborhood as well as for vacationers to my bucolic hometown in VT. I entered Boston College as a Music and Theater double major before switching to Sociology and Psychology. I completed one year at the Graduate School of Social Work with an emphasis on child life issues and early childhood development. Due to financial reasons I suspended my enrollment in grad school and worked full-time as a nanny for infant twins. I worked closely with their early intervention team to address cognitive and physical development issues. I continued to work with infants as well as multiples as my specialty but broadened my scope to all children ranging in age from newborn to 15 years of age working one-on-one or in group settings up to 12 children at a time. To supplement my hours as a nanny, I began teaching SAT prep with Kaplan and worked as a Mad Science teacher for after school and private events.

I am looking for a full-time nanny position where I can bring my nurturing spirit and experience to help support a family. I am excited to contribute to a household that values trust, communication, and creating a positive, enriching environment for children!

Greetings! My name is Devin, and I am an extremely creative, energetic and thoughtful caregiver. In addition to working with kids, I am a trained dramatic actor and improvisational comedy instructor. In addition to my experience in the performing arts, I studied visual arts and I'm passionate about bringing these talents to my work with children. I have found that connecting through laughter and creativity has the power to build powerful bonds with kids. Everyone wants to feel seen and heard, and offering that presence to kids can have a profound impact on their confidence and self-esteem.

I have cared for a very wide age range, including newborns, toddlers, and elementary school children. And have experience with food allergies and neurodivergent children. I currently work part-time with two wonderful, longtime families. I am open to both part-time and full-time work, as I'm interested in transitioning to a more traditional schedule.

description.displayText: Devin has worked with our family for almost 2 years, caring for our daughter from the time she was born until now and caring for our son since he was a year old. She is a delightful and talented person, and an incredibly caring, creative, and resourceful caregiver for children! We have found her to be reliable, communicative, respectful, and tactful. She demonstrates good judgment and attention to detail about our children's needs. Our children absolutely adore her and become deeply engrossed in imaginative play with her. She is an incredible artist and has greatly enhanced their enjoyment and appreciation of art. I give her credit for helping them to build a sense of humor as well! Devin is a very special person and we are lucky to have found her!
description.originalText: Devin has worked with our family for almost 2 years, caring for our daughter from the time she was born until now and caring for our son since he was a year old. She is a delightful and talented person, and an incredibly caring, creative, and resourceful caregiver for children! We have found her to be reliable, communicative, respectful, and tactful. Devin is a very special person and we are lucky to have found her!

bio.experienceSummary: I have over 3 years experience of child care and personal tutoring particularly in NYC and 10+ years of instructional experience in public school to ages varying from pre-k to school (to students of all needs and backgrounds), I am a compassionate and responsible caretaker who believes honest communication, patience, and an authentic interest in my students and clients' well-being is imperative.

Hello ! My name is Carola and I'm a professional nanny looking for part time or full time. I've more than 8 years of experience with all ages, from newborns to 16yo. 

I have my bachelor's in psychology and I love helping kids in improving their skills and help with their development.
I believe that effective communication and a lot of respect are the key while taking care of kids! They need helpful adults who are able to communicate in a kind and patience way in order to guide them in all stages of ages. 

I consider myself a very calm, patient and active person. I like to encourage children's creativity and ingenuity. 

Available ASAP, please do not hesitate to contact me.

description.displayText: Carola is very punctual and I like how she interacts with my daughter - she is calm and engaging at the same time. My daughter (16 months old) appears to feel very safe and happy with her. Carola is also very flexible when I ask her to stay longer than planned, and I appreciate that.
description.originalText: Carola is very punctual and I like how she interacts with my daughter - she is calm and engaging at the same time. My daughter (16 months old) appears to feel very safe and happy with her. Carola is also very flexible when I ask her to stay longer than planned, and I appreciate that.

bio.experienceSummary:
Hi there, I'm Danni! 

I've been working in childcare for 17 years. I'm a career nanny and have experience working with high net worth and high profile families. I am First Aid and CPR certified, I have certificates in child development, child psychology, cooking for children, RIE, newborn care and professional nannying. I am a Newborn Care Specialist, postpartum doula and have my Montessori 0-12 teaching diplomas and Professional Child Care diploma. I am a member of the International Nanny Association and keep myself up to date on current practices in childcare. 
I am a non smoker, college educated (Bachelors degree in Costume Design) speak fluent English and baby sign language.


I'm currently only available for evening and weekend babysitting!

*im flexible with my rates if I'm applying to a posted position I am comfortable with your rate range!

description.originalText: Danielle is a dream nanny.  She is extremely responsive, punctual, and patient.  Both of our sons (aged 7 and 2) love spending time with her, especially my older son who enjoys a great company.  She radiates a warm, cheerful personality that draws everyone in our family.  In addition, she is also very thoughtful, paying attention to our needs and generously offers assistance without being asked.  We highly recommend her as your family's best choice of care.  We look forward to having Danielle occasionally help out with evening/weekend babysitting.

bio.experienceSummary: I am an outgoing and experienced nanny from Newport Beach, California with over 20 years experience - working for multiple Los Angeles, Santa Barbara and Chicago families. I completed my BA in English and Psychology from New Zealand & Early Childhood education degree from University Concordia. I have experience in traveling with families both domestically and internationally and I am both CPR and First Aid certified. I am an extremely easygoing, fun-loving and active nanny who loves what I do and the families that I get the opportunity to work for. I have three big passions in life - kids, traveling and non-profit work. This work being just one of the many things that makes me happy. I have experience with infants, toddlers and teenagers, as well as children on the autism spectrum.

description.displayText: Caitlin is an amazing nanny. She has been watching our newborn for about a year now and is really good with her. She's basically a part of the family now. She's very punctual and always communicates with you. It's a great feeling when you know your little one is safe and in good hands.
description.originalText: Caitlin is an amazing nanny. She has been watching our newborn for about a year now and is really good with her. She's basically a part of the family now. She's very punctual and always communicates with you. It's a great feeling when you know your little one is safe and in good hands.

bio.experienceSummary: Masters in Clinical and Counseling Psychology with a concentration on early childhood eduation and child psychopathology from Columbia University's Teachers College with a 4. 0. Created and launched a yoga curriculum for preschoolers across 4 charter schools in NYC and have two years of teaching experience (kindergarten and preschoool). Teach a yoga club for children of all ages (early elementary and middle school). Worked as a research assistant for a mother-infant communication lab at New York Psychiatric Institute. Have babysat for over 12 years! Starting a dual school-clinical psychology doctorate program this fall at Yeshiva's Ferkauf Graduate School of Psychology.

As a nanny with over 11 years of experience working with high-profile families, I am a goal-oriented and motivated individual with a professional attitude. I possess outstanding communication and writing skills, and I am adept at handling tense and crisis situations. I have extensive knowledge in providing long-standing care for children, including shopping, cooking, preparing bottles, changing diapers, ironing, mending, organizing baths, and potty training. I am experienced in creating a preschool atmosphere at home to educate and entertain children. Additionally, I excel at coordinating children's schedules and planning birthday parties. I am also capable of teaching Russian language skills. I have experience with kids from newborn to 12 years old. I can drive in Manhattan or the Hamptons safely and efficiently. I have had the opportunity to travel extensively with the families.

description.displayText: She's very smart and quickly picked up C's schedule and how to deal with a cranky 18 month old with a cold. She fed her a lot even tho C is such a fussy eater, taught her words with flash cards, read to her and knew how to distract the toddler during goodbye and stressful times.
description.originalText: She's very smart and quickly picked up C's schedule and how to deal with a cranky 18 month old with a cold. She fed her a lot even tho C is such a fussy eater, taught her words with flash cards, read to her and knew how to distract the toddler during goodbye and stressful times.

bio.experienceSummary: Hi, I am Rachel from Brazil, a digital art student I speak Portuguese, English and Spanish I have 34 years and 7 years of nanny experience from infant to 10 years old. I am a responsible and warm caregiver, always careful observing and engaging children in age-appropriate activities to stimulate play and interaction creating a safe, playful, and enjoyable environment for kids to keep them happy, healthy and developing. Also flexible to work with parents to create a trustful relationship following their personal guidance to take care of their kids and help in their education. Very responsible driver (with a car available) and comfortable watching kids swimming and with pets in the house. I am CPR certified.

description.displayText: I love Rachel! She stayed at my home for three months, my kids were so sad when she left. Rachel is very punctual, she really care about people and it's clear that she love kids and dogs! She helped me with my kids when I needed to stay at home after my third pregnancy. I have two kids and two dogs (one is a puppy) she was always gentle with everyone, really supportive and fun. Miss you Rach.
